Gazeau, S\u00e9bastien Dupertuis et Alexis Mendoza","kind":"dev","methods":{"bid(string,uint256)":{"details":"Call this function each time a user place a new bid","params":{"_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"}},"checkAuctionTimeExpired(string,uint256)":{"details":"Call this function to check if the time of the auction is over or not","params":{"_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"},"returns":{"_0":"Returns a boolean to define if the auction time has expired (true) or not (false)"}},"endAuction(string,uint256)":{"details":"This function is called from the front when the auction time is expired","params":{"_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"}},"getBiddersAmount(string,uint256)":{"details":"Call this function from the front to display the amount of bidders over the given limit (here 1000)","params":{"_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"},"returns":{"_0":"Returns the amount of bidders (how many addresses)"}},"getCurrentHighestBid(string,uint256)":{"details":"Call this function when you want to know the value of the highest bid","params":{"_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"},"returns":{"_0":"Returns the value of the current highest bid"}},"getCurrentHighestBidder(string,uint256)":{"details":"Call this function when you want to know the address of the highest bidder","params":{"_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"},"returns":{"_0":"Returns the address of the current highest bidder"}},"initializeAuction(string,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Call this function when the user decides to sell his NFT through an auction. The owner can define a starting price if he sends money in the transaction.","params":{"_biddingTime":"Auction time in seconds","_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"}},"withdrawRefund(string,uint256)":{"details":"The user can call this function through the front when his bid is not the highest anymore.","params":{"_nftCollection":"Collection name of the given NFT","_nftTokenID":"Token ID of the given NFT"}}},"title":"A decentralized auction if the auction ended"},"endAuction(string,uint256)":{"notice":"This function allows to close the auction"},"getBiddersAmount(string,uint256)":{"notice":"This function allows to check for the amount of check for the current highest bidder"},"initializeAuction(string,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"This function allows to initiate a new auction"},"withdrawRefund(string,uint256)":{"notice":"This function devdoc.author: Sebastien Gazeau, Sébastien Dupertuis et Alexis Mendoza

bid(string,uint256).details: Call this function each time a user place a new bid

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

checkAuctionTimeExpired(string,uint256).details: Call this function to check if the time of the auction is over or not

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

returns._0: Returns a boolean to define if the auction time has expired (true) or not (false)

endAuction(string,uint256).details: This function is called from the front when the auction time is expired

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

getBiddersAmount(string,uint256).details: Call this function from the front to display the amount of bidders over the given limit (here 1000)

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

returns._0: Returns the amount of bidders (how many addresses)

getCurrentHighestBid(string,uint256).details: Call this function when you want to know the value of the highest bid

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

returns._0: Returns the value of the current highest bid

getCurrentHighestBidder(string,uint256).details: Call this function when you want to know the address of the highest bidder

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

returns._0: Returns the address of the current highest bidder

initializeAuction(string,uint256,uint256.details: Call this function when the user decides to sell his NFT through an auction. The owner can define a starting price if he sends money in the transaction.

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

withdrawRefund(string,uint256).details: The user can call this function through the front when his bid is not the highest anymore.

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

devdoc.title: A decentralized auction system

AuctionClosed(string,uint256,address,uin.notice: Event raised when the auction has finished

AuctionStarted(string,uint256,address).notice: Event raised when the auction has started

HighestBidIncreased(string,uint256,addre.notice: Event raised when the bid has increased

bid(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to place a new bid

checkAuctionTimeExpired(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to check if the auction ended

endAuction(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to close the auction

getBiddersAmount(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to check for the amount of bidders

getCurrentHighestBid(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to check for the current highest bid

getCurrentHighestBidder(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to check for the current highest bidder

initializeAuction(string,uint256,uint256.notice: This function allows to initiate a new auction

withdrawRefund(string,uint256).notice: This function allows a user that placed a bid (not the highest anymore) to get back his funds

userdoc.notice: This smart contract can be used in any NFT project requiring a system of auction
